name: Flipr
0:
”Alexa, open Flipr.”
”Alexa, ask Flipr if i can i go swimming.”
”Alexa, ask Flipr about the water's temperature.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: flipr
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Put Flipr in the water of your pool: it analyzes the water and tells you what to do to keep your pool clean and reduce your maintenance costs. Connected to your voice assistant, Flipr will inform you about the current water temperature, the level of disinfectant, the pH level and will indicate the current alerts!

The skill content is in English and French.
